html:
Write it in.

If you want the editorial to draw attention to a subject, you want to tell me something, send a press release if you have any questions, send us a message right off the website. Messages from the COMMITMENT site are read in writing.If you want us to call you back or write, tell me how you can get in touch.♪ Keep in mind that the messages that come from this page are not published.

Under Wolgograd, a schoolgirl mixed up rat poison candy. Girl in the hospital

Cases07.02.2024 17:39
Comments0
07.02.2024 17:39

In Mihailovke Volgograd, nine-school students were taken to the hospital with the strongest poisoning. As V102.RU became known from its own source, the girl mistakenly accepted the pesticide. - The teenager was taken to Mihail CRB on the eve. The doctors managed to normalize the condition of the victim, specifying the source. It's known that a schoolgirl mistook the poison with candy. A teenage girl raising...
